sentences.zh: 王者制事立法，物度軌則，壹稟於六律，六律為萬事根本焉。

translations.literal: Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, one receive from six pitchpipes, six pitchpipes are ten thousand affairs root there.
translations.idiomatic: Kings establish affairs and make laws, measure things by tracks and rules, all receiving from the six pitchpipes. The six pitchpipes are the root of all affairs.

translations.literal: Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, all receive from six pitches, six pitches are ten thousand affairs root.

sentences.zh: 其於兵械尤所重，故云「望敵知吉凶，聞聲效勝負」，百王不易之道也。

translations.literal: Its at weapons especially what heavy, therefore say "gaze enemy know auspicious inauspicious, hear sound imitate victory defeat", hundred kings unchanging way also.
translations.idiomatic: They especially value it for weapons, hence the saying: 'Gaze at the enemy to know auspiciousness and inauspiciousness, hear the sound to imitate victory and defeat.' This is the unchanging way of the hundred kings.

translations.literal: Their regard for weapons especially heavy, thus said 'look at enemy know good bad, hear sound know victory defeat', hundred kings unchanging way.

sentences.zh: 武王伐紂，吹律聽聲，推孟春以至于季冬，殺氣相并，而音尚宮。

translations.literal: Wu King attacked Zhou, blew pitchpipes listened sound, extended first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually joined, but sound still palace.
translations.idiomatic: When King Wu attacked Zhou, he blew the pitchpipes and listened to the sounds, extending from the first month of spring to the last month of winter. The killing qi joined together, but the sound still belonged to the palace mode.

sentences.zh: 同聲相從，物之自然，何足怪哉？

translations.literal: Same sound mutually follow, things natural, what sufficient strange?
translations.idiomatic: Like sounds follow each other - this is the natural way of things. What is there to be surprised about?

translations.literal: Wu Wang attacked Zhou, blew pitches listened to sound, pushed first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually combined, sound still gong. Same sound mutually follow, things' natural, what sufficient to wonder?

sentences.zh: 兵者，聖人所以討彊暴，平亂世，夷險阻，救危殆。

translations.literal: Weapons, sages thus punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangerous obstacles, save perilous dangerous.
translations.idiomatic: Weapons are what sages use to punish the strong and violent, pacify chaotic ages, level dangerous obstacles, and save from perilous danger.

sentences.zh: 自含（血）［齒］戴角之獸見犯則校，而況於人懷好惡喜怒之氣？

translations.literal: From contain teeth wear horns beasts see offense then fight, moreover about people harbor likes dislikes joy anger qi?
translations.idiomatic: Even beasts that contain teeth and wear horns fight when they see offense. How much more so with people who harbor the qi of likes, dislikes, joy, and anger?

sentences.zh: 喜則愛心生，怒則毒螫加，情性之理也。

translations.literal: Happy then love heart born, angry then poison sting add, feelings nature principle also.
translations.idiomatic: When happy, loving hearts are born; when angry, poisonous stings are added. This is the principle of feelings and nature.

translations.literal: Warriors, sages use to punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangers obstacles, save peril crisis. From containing teeth wearing horns beasts see violation then fight, moreover concerning people harboring likes dislikes happy angry qi? Happy then loving heart born, angry then poisonous sting added, feelings nature's principle.

sentences.zh: 昔黃帝有涿鹿之戰，以定火災；

translations.literal: Former Yellow Emperor had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster;
translations.idiomatic: In ancient times the Yellow Emperor had the battle of Zhuolu to settle the fire disaster;

sentences.zh: 顓頊有共工之陳，以平水害；

translations.literal: Zhuanxu had Gonggong battle array, to pacify water harm;
translations.idiomatic: Zhuanxu had the battle array against Gonggong to pacify the water harm;

sentences.zh: 成湯有南巢之伐，以殄夏亂。

translations.literal: Cheng Tang had Nanchao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos.
translations.idiomatic: Cheng Tang had the attack on Nanchao to exterminate the Xia chaos.

sentences.zh: 遞興遞廢，勝者用事，所受於天也。

translations.literal: Alternately rise alternately abandon, victors use affairs, what received from heaven also.
translations.idiomatic: They alternately rose and were abandoned; victors conducted affairs. This was received from heaven.

translations.literal: Former Huang Di had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster; Zhuan Xu had Gong Gong battle array, to pacify water harm; Cheng Tang had Nan Chao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos. Successively rise successively waste, victors use affairs, received from heaven.

sentences.zh: 自是之後，名士迭興，晉用咎犯，而齊用王子，吳用孫武，申明軍約，賞罰必信，卒伯諸侯，兼列邦土，雖不及三代之誥誓，然身寵君尊，當世顯揚，可不謂榮焉？

translations.literal: From this after, famous scholars alternately rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, and Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, explained clear army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, troops hegemon feudal lords, combined listed state lands, though not reach three dynasties declarations oaths, however body favored lord honored, current age famous raised, can not call glory there?
translations.idiomatic: After this, famous scholars alternately rose. Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu. They explained and clarified military covenants, making rewards and punishments necessarily trustworthy. Their troops became hegemons over the feudal lords, combining the listed state lands. Though they did not reach the declarations and oaths of the Three Dynasties, their persons were favored, their lords honored, they were famous and raised in the current age - can this not be called glory?

sentences.zh: 豈與世儒闇於大較，不權輕重，猥云德化，不當用兵，大至君辱失守，小乃侵犯削弱，遂執不移等哉！

translations.literal: How with world Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, foolishly say virtue transformation, not proper use weapons, great to lord humiliated lose defense, small then invade weaken, then hold not move equal!
translations.idiomatic: How can this compare to the world's Confucians who are dark about the great outline, do not weigh light and heavy, foolishly say virtue and transformation, not proper to use weapons? In the great case it leads to the lord being humiliated and losing his defense, in the small case it leads to invasion and weakening. They then hold to this without moving!

sentences.zh: 笔教笞不可廢於家，刑罰不可捐於國，誅伐不可偃於天下，用之有巧拙，行之有逆順耳。

translations.literal: Writing teaching cane cannot abandon in family, punishments cannot discard in state, executions attacks cannot rest in realm, use have skillful clumsy, carry out have contrary compliant ears.
translations.idiomatic: Writing instruction and caning cannot be abandoned in the family. Punishments cannot be discarded in the state. Executions and attacks cannot rest in the realm. Using them has skillful and clumsy, carrying them out has contrary and compliant - that's all.

translations.literal: From this after, famous scholars successively rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, declared army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, finally hegemon feudal lords, annexed column state lands, though not reach three dynasties' announcements oaths, yet body honored lord respected, contemporary illustrious praised, can not call glorious? How with worldly Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, vile speak virtue transformation, not appropriate use troops, great to lord insulted lost defense, small then invaded diminished weakened, then held not move etc! Writing teaching cane cannot waste in home, punishments cannot abandon in state, executions cannot cease in world, use has skillful clumsy, carry has reverse proper only.

sentences.zh: 夏桀、殷紂手搏豺狼，足追四馬，勇非微也；

translations.literal: Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled jackals wolves, feet chased four horses, bravery not small also;
translations.idiomatic: Xia Jie and Yin Zhou hand-wrestled jackals and wolves, their feet chased four horses - their bravery was not small;

sentences.zh: 百戰克勝，諸侯懾服，權非輕也。

translations.literal: Hundred battles overcome victory, feudal lords awed submit, authority not light also.
translations.idiomatic: They won victory in a hundred battles, the feudal lords were awed and submitted - their authority was not light.

sentences.zh: 秦二世宿軍無用之地，連兵於邊陲，力非弱也；

translations.literal: Qin Second Generation stationed army useless lands, connected weapons at borders, strength not weak also;
translations.idiomatic: Qin Ershi stationed armies in useless lands, connected weapons at the borders - their strength was not weak;

sentences.zh: 結怨匈奴，絓禍於越，勢非寡也。

translations.literal: Formed resentment Xiongnu, implicated calamity in Yue, influence not few also.
translations.idiomatic: They formed resentment with the Xiongnu, implicated calamity in Yue - their influence was not few.

sentences.zh: 及其威盡勢極，閭巷之人為敵國，咎生窮武之不知足，甘得之心不息也。

translations.literal: Until their awe exhausted influence extreme, alley lane people became enemy states, blame born from exhausting martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not cease also.
translations.idiomatic: When their awe was exhausted and influence extreme, the people of alleys and lanes became enemy states. The blame arose from exhausting martial pursuits without knowing sufficiency, the heart of sweet gains not ceasing.

translations.literal: Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled wolves boars, feet pursued four horses, brave not slight; Hundred battles victorious, feudal lords awed submitted, power not light. Qin Er Shi garrisoned troops useless places, connected troops at borders, strength not weak; Tied resentment Xiongnu, entangled calamity Yue, momentum not few. When authority exhausted momentum extreme, alley people became enemy state, fault born from martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not rest.

sentences.zh: 高祖有天下，三邊外畔；

translations.literal: Gaozu possessed realm, three borders external rebelled;
translations.idiomatic: When Gaozu possessed the realm, the three borders externally rebelled;

sentences.zh: 大國之王雖稱蕃輔，臣節未盡。

translations.literal: Great states kings though called screen auxiliaries, minister conduct not complete.
translations.idiomatic: The kings of great states, though called screens and auxiliaries, did not complete their ministerial conduct.

sentences.zh: 會高祖厭苦軍事，亦有蕭、張之謀，故偃武一休息，羈縻不備。

translations.literal: Met Gaozu tired bitter military affairs, also had Xiao, Zhang plans, therefore rested martial one rest, restraint bridle not complete.
translations.idiomatic: When Gaozu became tired of bitter military affairs, he also had the plans of Xiao He and Zhang Liang, therefore he rested martial affairs for a time, and restraint was not complete.

translations.literal: Gao Zu had world, three borders outside rebelled; Great states' kings though called auxiliary support, minister conduct not complete. Met Gao Zu weary bitter military affairs, also had Xiao Zhang plans, thus ceased martial one rest, restrained not prepared.

sentences.zh: 歷至孝文即位，將軍陳武等議曰：「南越、朝鮮自全秦時內屬為臣子，後且擁兵阻阸，選蠕觀望。

translations.literal: Passed to Filial Wen ascended throne, General Chen Wu etc discussed saying: "Nanyue, Chaoxian from complete Qin time internally belonged as minister children, later moreover held weapons blocked defiles, selected moved observed waited."
translations.idiomatic: When it came to Emperor Wen's ascension, General Chen Wu and others discussed saying: 'Nanyue and Chaoxian, from the time of complete Qin, internally belonged as minister and children. Later they moreover held weapons and blocked defiles, selected and moved while observing and waiting.'

sentences.zh: 高祖時天下新定，人民小安，未可復興兵。

translations.literal: Gaozu time realm newly settled, people slightly peaceful, not able again raise weapons.
translations.idiomatic: In Gaozu's time the realm was newly settled, the people slightly peaceful - it was not possible to again raise weapons.

sentences.zh: 今陛下仁惠撫百姓，恩澤加海內，宜及士民樂用，征討逆黨，以一封疆。」

translations.literal: Now Your Majesty benevolent kind caress common people, grace moisture add realm within, should take advantage scholar people happy use, campaign attack rebellious faction, to unify borders."
translations.idiomatic: 'Now Your Majesty with benevolence and kindness caresses the common people, adds grace and moisture to the realm within. You should take advantage of the scholars and people being happy to be used, campaign and attack the rebellious faction, to unify the borders.'

sentences.zh: 孝文曰：「朕能任衣冠，念不到此。

translations.literal: Filial Wen said: "I can bear the cap gown, thought not reach this."
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Wen said: 'I can bear the cap and gown, but my thoughts do not reach this.'

sentences.zh: 會呂氏之亂，功臣宗室共不羞恥，誤居正位，常戰戰慄慄，恐事之不終。

translations.literal: Met Lü clan chaos, meritorious ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, mistakenly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling fearful, feared matters not end.
translations.idiomatic: When the Lü clan chaos occurred, the meritorious ministers and clan relatives together were not ashamed, mistakenly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling with fear, fearing that matters would not end.

sentences.zh: 且兵凶器，雖克所願，動亦秏病，謂百姓遠方何？

translations.literal: Moreover weapons ominous tools, though overcome wished, move also consume illness, say common people distant places what?
translations.idiomatic: Moreover weapons are ominous tools. Though they overcome what is wished, movement also consumes and sickens. What of the common people in distant places?

sentences.zh: 又先帝知勞民不可煩，故不以為意。

translations.literal: Also former emperor knew tiring people not able trouble, therefore not considered it.
translations.idiomatic: Also the former emperor knew that tiring the people was not to be troubled with, therefore did not consider it.

sentences.zh: 朕豈自謂能？

translations.literal: I how self say able?
translations.idiomatic: How could I claim ability for myself?

sentences.zh: 今匈奴內侵，軍吏無功，邊民父子荷兵日久，朕常為動心傷痛，無日忘之。

translations.literal: Now Xiongnu internally invade, military officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget it.
translations.idiomatic: Now the Xiongnu invade internally, military officials have no merit, border people fathers and sons have carried weapons for long days. I am constantly moved in heart and pained, forgetting it no day.

sentences.zh: 今未能銷距，願且堅邊設候，結和通使，休寧北陲，為功多矣。

translations.literal: Now not able melt distance, wish moreover strengthen border set scouts, form peace connect envoys, rest peaceful northern border, for merit much already.
translations.idiomatic: Now not able to melt the distance, I wish moreover to strengthen the border and set scouts, form peace and connect envoys, rest and peaceful the northern border - this would be much merit.

sentences.zh: 且無議軍。」

translations.literal: Moreover no discuss military."
translations.idiomatic: Moreover do not discuss military affairs."

sentences.zh: 故百姓無內外之繇，得息肩於田畝，天下殷富，粟至十餘錢，鳴雞吠狗，煙火萬里，可謂和樂者乎！

translations.literal: Therefore common people no internal external corvee, obtain rest shoulders in fields acres, realm abundant rich, millet reach ten several cash, crowing roosters barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy ones!
translations.idiomatic: Therefore the common people had no internal or external corvee, obtained rest for their shoulders in the fields and acres. The realm was abundantly rich, millet reached ten several cash. Crowing roosters and barking dogs, smoke and fires for ten thousand li - can this be called harmonious and happy!

translations.literal: Continued to Xiao Wen ascended throne, generals Chen Wu etc discussed: 'Nan Yue, Chao Xian from complete Qin time inner belonged as minister children, after moreover held troops blocked passes, wriggling watching. Gao Zu time world newly settled, people small peaceful, not could again raise troops. Now Your Majesty benevolent gracious caressed hundred families, favor moisture added within seas, appropriate reach scholar people happy use, attack rebellious parties, to unify borders.' Xiao Wen said: 'I can bear robe hat, thought not reach this. Met Lu clan chaos, merit ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, wrongly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling trembling, feared affairs not end. Moreover troops ominous instruments, though conquer wished, move also exhaust illness, say hundred families far places what? Also former emperor knew toil people cannot trouble, thus not took as intent. I how self say able? Now Xiongnu inner invade, army officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget. Now not able dissolve defense, wish moreover strengthen borders set scouts, tie peace connect envoys, rest peaceful north borders, for merit many. Moreover no discuss troops.' Thus hundred families no inner outer corvee, got rest shoulders at fields, world prosperous rich, grain to ten plus cash, crowing cocks barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy!

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：文帝時，會天下新去湯火，人民樂業，因其欲然，能不擾亂，故百姓遂安。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Wen Emperor time, met realm newly gone hot water, people happy occupations, followed their desires thus, able not disturb chaos, therefore common people then peaceful.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: In Emperor Wen's time, when the realm had newly escaped hot water, the people were happy in their occupations. He followed their desires thus, was able not to disturb and cause chaos, therefore the common people then became peaceful.

sentences.zh: 自年六七十翁亦未嘗至市井，游敖嬉戲如小兒狀。

translations.literal: Even year sixty seventy old men also never reached marketplaces, strolled played frolicked like children appearance.
translations.idiomatic: Even old men of sixty or seventy years also never reached the marketplaces, strolled and played, frolicked like children's appearance.

sentences.zh: 孔子所稱有德君子者邪！

translations.literal: Confucius what praised virtuous gentleman ones!
translations.idiomatic: These are what Confucius praised as virtuous gentlemen!

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Wen emperor time, met world newly left cauldrons fires, people happy occupations, followed their wish thus, could not disturb chaos, thus hundred families then peaceful. From age sixty seventy old men also not tasted to market wells, roam play frolic like children appearance. Confucius called virtuous gentleman ones!

sentences.zh: 《書》曰［七正］，二十八舍。

translations.literal: Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodgings.
translations.idiomatic: The Book says: seven correct, twenty-eight lodgings.

sentences.zh: 律歷，天所以通五行八正之氣，天所以成孰萬物也。

translations.literal: Pitchpipes calendar, heaven thus connect five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus complete mature ten thousand things also.
translations.idiomatic: Pitchpipes and calendar are what heaven uses to connect the qi of the five phases and eight correct. Heaven uses them to complete and mature the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 舍者，日月所舍。

translations.literal: Lodging ones, sun moon what lodge.
translations.idiomatic: Lodgings are what the sun and moon lodge in.

sentences.zh: 舍者，舒氣也。

translations.literal: Lodging ones, relax qi also.
translations.idiomatic: Lodgings are where qi relaxes.

translations.literal: Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodges. Pitch calendar, heaven thus connects five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus completes ripens ten thousand things. Lodges, sun moon lodged. Lodges, loose qi.

sentences.zh: 不周風居西北，主殺生。

translations.literal: Imperfect wind dwells northwest, governs killing living.
translations.idiomatic: The Imperfect Wind dwells in the northwest, governing killing and living.

sentences.zh: 東壁居不周風東，主辟生氣而東之。

translations.literal: Eastern wall dwells imperfect wind east, governs avoid living qi and east it.
translations.idiomatic: The Eastern Wall dwells east of the Imperfect Wind, governing to avoid the living qi and direct it east.

sentences.zh: 至於營室。

translations.literal: Until camp room.
translations.idiomatic: Until the Camp Room.

sentences.zh: 營室者，主營胎陽氣而產之。

translations.literal: Camp room ones, govern nurture embryo yang qi and produce it.
translations.idiomatic: The Camp Room governs nurturing the embryo yang qi and producing it.

sentences.zh: 東至于危。

translations.literal: East until Wei.
translations.idiomatic: East until Wei.

sentences.zh: 危，垝也。

translations.literal: Wei, danger also.
translations.idiomatic: Wei means danger.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣之（危）垝，故曰危。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi of danger, therefore called Wei.
translations.idiomatic: It speaks of the yang qi being in danger, therefore it is called Wei.

sentences.zh: 十月也，律中應鐘。

translations.literal: Tenth month also, pitchpipe middle Yingzhong.
translations.idiomatic: This is the tenth month, the pitchpipe is Yingzhong.

sentences.zh: 應鐘者，陽氣之應，不用事也。

translations.literal: Yingzhong ones, yang qi respond, not use affairs also.
translations.idiomatic: Yingzhong is the yang qi responding, not using affairs.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為亥。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is hai.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is hai.

sentences.zh: 亥者，該也。

translations.literal: Hai ones, encompass also.
translations.idiomatic: Hai means to encompass.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣藏於下，故該也。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi hide below, therefore encompass also.
translations.idiomatic: It speaks of yang qi hiding below, therefore encompassing.

translations.literal: Not Zhou wind dwells northwest, governs killing birth. Dong Bi dwells Not Zhou wind east, governs open birth qi east it. To Ying Shi. Ying Shi, governs camp fetal yang qi produce it. East to Wei. Wei, wei. Speak yang qi wei wei, thus called Wei. Tenth month, pitch middle Ying Zhong. Ying Zhong, yang qi response, not use affairs. Its at twelve branches for Hai. Hai, contain. Speak yang qi store at below, thus contain.

sentences.zh: 廣莫風居北方。

translations.literal: Guangmo wind dwells northern.
translations.idiomatic: The Guangmo wind dwells in the north.

sentences.zh: 廣莫者，言陽氣在下，陰莫陽廣大也，故曰廣莫。

translations.literal: Guangmo ones, speak yang qi in below, yin none yang vast great also, therefore called Guangmo.
translations.idiomatic: Guangmo speaks of yang qi being below, yin having none while yang is vast and great, therefore it is called Guangmo.

sentences.zh: 東至於虛。

translations.literal: East until Xu.
translations.idiomatic: East until Xu.

sentences.zh: 虛者，能實能虛，言陽氣冬則宛藏於虛，日冬至則一陰下藏，一陽上舒，故曰虛。

translations.literal: Xu ones, able solid able empty, speak yang qi winter then curled hide in Xu, sun winter solstice then one yin below hide, one yang above relax, therefore called Xu.
translations.idiomatic: Xu is able to be solid and able to be empty. It speaks of yang qi in winter being curled and hidden in Xu. When the sun reaches winter solstice, one yin hides below, one yang relaxes above, therefore it is called Xu.

sentences.zh: 東至于須女。

translations.literal: East until Xu Nu.
translations.idiomatic: East until Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 言萬物變動其所，陰陽氣未相離，尚相［如］胥［如］也，故曰須女。

translations.literal: Speak ten thousand things change move their place, yin yang qi not yet mutually separate, still mutually like Xu like also, therefore called Xu Nu.
translations.idiomatic: It speaks of the ten thousand things changing and moving in their places, yin and yang qi not yet mutually separating, still being mutually like Xu, therefore it is called Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 十一月也，律中黃鐘。

translations.literal: Eleventh month also, pitchpipe middle Huangzhong.
translations.idiomatic: This is the eleventh month, the pitchpipe is Huangzhong.

sentences.zh: 黃鐘者，陽氣踵黃泉而出也。

translations.literal: Huangzhong ones, yang qi follows yellow springs and emerges also.
translations.idiomatic: Huangzhong is yang qi following the yellow springs and emerging.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為子。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is zi.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is zi.

sentences.zh: 子者，滋也；

translations.literal: Zi ones, nourish also;
translations.idiomatic: Zi means to nourish;

sentences.zh: 滋者，言萬物滋於下也。

translations.literal: Nourish ones, speak ten thousand things nourish below also.
translations.idiomatic: Nourish speaks of the ten thousand things being nourished below.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為壬癸。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers is Ren Gui.
translations.idiomatic: Among the ten mothers it is Ren and Gui.

sentences.zh: 壬之為言任也，言陽氣任養萬物於下也。

translations.literal: Ren of speak bear also, speak yang qi bears nourishes ten thousand things below also.
translations.idiomatic: Ren speaks of bearing, speaking of yang qi bearing and nourishing the ten thousand things below.

sentences.zh: 癸之為言揆也，言萬物可揆度，故曰癸。

translations.literal: Gui of speak measure also, speak ten thousand things can measure degree, therefore called Gui.
translations.idiomatic: Gui speaks of measuring, speaking of the ten thousand things being measurable, therefore it is called Gui.

sentences.zh: 東至牽牛。

translations.literal: East until Ox Leader.
translations.idiomatic: East until Ox Leader.

sentences.zh: 牽牛者，言陽氣牽引萬物出之也。

translations.literal: Ox Leader ones, speak yang qi pulls leads ten thousand things emerge it also.
translations.idiomatic: Ox Leader speaks of yang qi pulling and leading the ten thousand things to emerge.

sentences.zh: 牛者，冒也，言地雖凍，能冒而生也。

translations.literal: Ox ones, brave also, speak earth though frozen, able brave and live also.
translations.idiomatic: Ox means brave, speaking of the earth though frozen being able to brave and live.

sentences.zh: 牛者，耕植種萬物也。

translations.literal: Ox ones, plow plant sow ten thousand things also.
translations.idiomatic: Ox plows, plants, and sows the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 東至於建星。

translations.literal: East until Jian Star.
translations.idiomatic: East until Jian Star.

sentences.zh: 建星者，建諸生也。

translations.literal: Jian Star ones, establish various living also.
translations.idiomatic: Jian Star establishes the various living things.

sentences.zh: 十二月也，律中大呂。

translations.literal: Twelfth month also, pitchpipe middle Dali.
translations.idiomatic: This is the twelfth month, the pitchpipe is Dali.

sentences.zh: 大呂者。

translations.literal: Dali ones.
translations.idiomatic: Dali is.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為醜。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Chou.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Chou.

translations.literal: Guang Mo wind dwells north. Guang Mo, speak yang qi at below, yin cannot yang vast great, thus Guang Mo. East to Xu. Xu, able solid able empty, speak yang qi winter then curl store at xu, winter solstice then one yin below store, one yang above stretch, thus Xu. East to Xu Nu. Speak ten thousand things change their place, yin yang qi not yet separate, still mutually like xu like, thus Xu Nu. Eleventh month, pitch middle Huang Zhong. Huang Zhong, yang qi follow yellow springs exit. Its at twelve branches for Zi. Zi, nourish; Nourish, speak ten thousand things nourish at below. Its at ten mothers for Ren Gui. Ren speak, Ren, speak yang qi Ren nourish ten thousand things at below. Gui speak, Kui, speak ten thousand things can Kui measure, thus Gui. East to Qian Niu. Qian Niu, speak yang qi qian lead ten thousand things exit them. Niu, cover, speak earth though freeze, able cover born. Niu, plow plant sow ten thousand things. East to Jian Xing. Jian Xing, jian various born. Twelfth month, pitch middle Da Lu. Da Lu. Its at twelve branches for Chou.

sentences.zh: 條風居東北，主出萬物。

translations.literal: Tiao wind dwells northeast, governs emerge ten thousand things.
translations.idiomatic: The Tiao wind dwells in the northeast, governing the emergence of the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 條之言條治萬物而出之，故曰條風。

translations.literal: Tiao of speak arrange govern ten thousand things and emerge it, therefore called Tiao wind.
translations.idiomatic: Tiao speaks of arranging and governing the ten thousand things and emerging them, therefore it is called Tiao wind.

sentences.zh: 南至於箕。

translations.literal: South until Ji.
translations.idiomatic: South until Ji.

sentences.zh: 箕者，言萬物根棋，故曰箕。

translations.literal: Ji ones, speak ten thousand things roots dispersed, therefore called Ji.
translations.idiomatic: Ji speaks of the ten thousand things' roots being dispersed, therefore it is called Ji.

sentences.zh: 正月也，律中泰蔟。

translations.literal: First month also, pitchpipe middle Tai Cu.
translations.idiomatic: This is the first month, the pitchpipe is Tai Cu.

sentences.zh: 泰蔟者，言萬物蔟生也，故曰泰蔟。

translations.literal: Tai Cu ones, speak ten thousand things clustered live also, therefore called Tai Cu.
translations.idiomatic: Tai Cu speaks of the ten thousand things clustered and living, therefore it is called Tai Cu.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為寅。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Yin.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Yin.

sentences.zh: 寅言萬物始生螾然也，故曰寅。

translations.literal: Yin speak ten thousand things begin live wriggling appearance also, therefore called Yin.
translations.idiomatic: Yin speaks of the ten thousand things beginning to live with a wriggling appearance, therefore it is called Yin.

sentences.zh: 南至於尾，言萬物始生如尾也。

translations.literal: South until Tail, speak ten thousand things begin live like tail also.
translations.idiomatic: South until Tail, speaking of the ten thousand things beginning to live like a tail.

sentences.zh: 南至於心，言萬物始生有華心也。

translations.literal: South until Heart, speak ten thousand things begin live have flowery heart also.
translations.idiomatic: South until Heart, speaking of the ten thousand things beginning to live having a flowery heart.

sentences.zh: 南至於房。

translations.literal: South until Fang.
translations.idiomatic: South until Fang.

sentences.zh: 房者，言萬物門戶也，至于門則出矣。

translations.literal: Fang ones, speak ten thousand things door gate also, arrive at gate then emerge already.
translations.idiomatic: Fang speaks of the ten thousand things' door and gate. When they arrive at the gate then they emerge.

translations.literal: Tiao wind dwells northeast, governs exit ten thousand things. Tiao speak tiao govern ten thousand things exit them, thus Tiao wind. South to Ji. Ji, speak ten thousand things root ji, thus Ji. First month, pitch middle Tai Cu. Tai Cu, speak ten thousand things cu born, thus Tai Cu. Its at twelve branches for Yin. Yin speak ten thousand things begin born yong thus, thus Yin. South to Wei, speak ten thousand things begin born like wei. South to Xin, speak ten thousand things begin born have hua xin. South to Fang. Fang, speak ten thousand things door gate, reach door then exit.

sentences.zh: 明庶風居東方。

translations.literal: Ming Shu wind dwells eastern.
translations.idiomatic: The Ming Shu wind dwells in the east.

sentences.zh: 明庶者，明眾物盡出也。

translations.literal: Ming Shu ones, bright all things completely emerge also.
translations.idiomatic: Ming Shu makes all things brightly completely emerge.

sentences.zh: 二月也，律中夾鐘。

translations.literal: Second month also, pitchpipe middle Jia Zhong.
translations.idiomatic: This is the second month, the pitchpipe is Jia Zhong.

sentences.zh: 夾鐘者，言陰陽相夾廁也。

translations.literal: Jia Zhong ones, speak yin yang mutually sandwiched mixed also.
translations.idiomatic: Jia Zhong speaks of yin and yang mutually sandwiched and mixed.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為卯。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Mao.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Mao.

sentences.zh: 卯之為言茂也，言萬物茂也。

translations.literal: Mao of speak luxuriant also, speak ten thousand things luxuriant also.
translations.idiomatic: Mao speaks of luxuriant, speaking of the ten thousand things being luxuriant.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為甲乙。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers is Jia Yi.
translations.idiomatic: Among the ten mothers it is Jia and Yi.

sentences.zh: 甲者，言萬物剖符甲而出也；

translations.literal: Jia ones, speak ten thousand things split tally armor and emerge also;
translations.idiomatic: Jia speaks of the ten thousand things splitting tally armor and emerging;

sentences.zh: 乙者，言萬物生軋軋也。

translations.literal: Yi ones, speak ten thousand things live grinding grinding also.
translations.idiomatic: Yi speaks of the ten thousand things living with grinding sounds.

sentences.zh: 南至于氐者。

translations.literal: South until Di ones.
translations.idiomatic: South until Di.

sentences.zh: 氐者，言萬物皆至也。

translations.literal: Di ones, speak ten thousand things all arrive also.
translations.idiomatic: Di speaks of the ten thousand things all arriving.

sentences.zh: 南至於亢。

translations.literal: South until Kang.
translations.idiomatic: South until Kang.

sentences.zh: 亢者，言萬物亢見也。

translations.literal: Kang ones, speak ten thousand things high see also.
translations.idiomatic: Kang speaks of the ten thousand things being high and visible.

sentences.zh: 南至于角。

translations.literal: South until Jiao.
translations.idiomatic: South until Jiao.

sentences.zh: 角者，言萬物皆有枝格如角也。

translations.literal: Jiao ones, speak ten thousand things all have branch frame like horn also.
translations.idiomatic: Jiao speaks of the ten thousand things all having branch frames like horns.

sentences.zh: 三月也，律中姑洗。

translations.literal: Third month also, pitchpipe middle Gu Xi.
translations.idiomatic: This is the third month, the pitchpipe is Gu Xi.

sentences.zh: 姑洗者，言萬物洗生。

translations.literal: Gu Xi ones, speak ten thousand things wash live.
translations.idiomatic: Gu Xi speaks of the ten thousand things being washed and living.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為辰。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Chen.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Chen.

sentences.zh: 辰者，言萬物之蜄也。

translations.literal: Chen ones, speak ten thousand things of morning also.
translations.idiomatic: Chen speaks of the ten thousand things in the morning.

translations.literal: Second month, pitch middle Jia Zhong. Jia Zhong, speak yin yang mutually jia mix. Its at twelve branches for Mao. Mao speak, Mao, speak ten thousand things mao. Ming Shu wind dwells southeast corner, governs long nourish ten thousand things. Ming Shu wind dwells southeast corner, governs long nourish ten thousand things. South to Di. Di, speak ten thousand things all arrive. South to Kang. Kang, speak ten thousand things kang appear. Di, speak ten thousand things all arrive. South to Kang. Kang, speak ten thousand things kang appear. South to Jue. Jue, speak ten thousand things all have branches angles like jue. Third month, pitch middle Gu Xi. Gu Xi, speak ten thousand things wash born. Its at twelve branches for Chen. Chen, speak ten thousand things chen.

sentences.zh: 清明風居東南維，主風吹萬物而西之。

translations.literal: Qingming wind dwells southeast corner, governs wind blow ten thousand things and west it.
translations.idiomatic: The Qingming wind dwells in the southeast corner, governing the wind to blow the ten thousand things west.

sentences.zh: ［至於］軫。

translations.literal: Until Zhen.
translations.idiomatic: Until Zhen.

sentences.zh: 軫者，言萬物益大而軫軫然。

translations.literal: Zhen ones, speak ten thousand things increasingly big and Zhen Zhen appearance.
translations.idiomatic: Zhen speaks of the ten thousand things increasingly big with a Zhen Zhen appearance.

sentences.zh: 西至於翼。

translations.literal: West until Yi.
translations.idiomatic: West until Yi.

sentences.zh: 翼者，言萬物皆有羽翼也。

translations.literal: Yi ones, speak ten thousand things all have feather wings also.
translations.idiomatic: Yi speaks of the ten thousand things all having feather wings.

sentences.zh: 四月也，律中中呂。

translations.literal: Fourth month also, pitchpipe middle Zhong Lü.
translations.idiomatic: This is the fourth month, the pitchpipe is Zhong Lü.

sentences.zh: 中呂者，言萬物盡旅而西行也。

translations.literal: Zhong Lü ones, speak ten thousand things all group and west go also.
translations.idiomatic: Zhong Lü speaks of the ten thousand things all grouping and going west.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為巳。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Si.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Si.

sentences.zh: 巳者，言陽氣之已盡也。

translations.literal: Si ones, speak yang qi of already exhausted also.
translations.idiomatic: Si speaks of the yang qi already being exhausted.

sentences.zh: 西至于七星。

translations.literal: West until Seven Stars.
translations.idiomatic: West until Seven Stars.

sentences.zh: 七星者，陽數成於七，故曰七星。

translations.literal: Seven Stars ones, yang number completes at seven, therefore called Seven Stars.
translations.idiomatic: Seven Stars is where the yang number completes at seven, therefore it is called Seven Stars.

sentences.zh: 西至于張。

translations.literal: West until Zhang.
translations.idiomatic: West until Zhang.

sentences.zh: 張者，言萬物皆張也。

translations.literal: Zhang ones, speak ten thousand things all stretch also.
translations.idiomatic: Zhang speaks of the ten thousand things all stretching.

sentences.zh: 西至于注。

translations.literal: West until Zhu.
translations.idiomatic: West until Zhu.

sentences.zh: 注者，言萬物之始衰，陽氣下注，故曰注。

translations.literal: Zhu ones, speak ten thousand things of begin decline, yang qi down pour, therefore called Zhu.
translations.idiomatic: Zhu speaks of the ten thousand things beginning to decline, yang qi pouring down, therefore it is called Zhu.

sentences.zh: 五月也，律中蕤賓。

translations.literal: Fifth month also, pitchpipe middle Rui Bin.
translations.idiomatic: This is the fifth month, the pitchpipe is Rui Bin.

sentences.zh: 蕤賓者，言陰氣幼少，故曰蕤；

translations.literal: Rui Bin ones, speak yin qi young few, therefore called Rui;
translations.idiomatic: Rui Bin speaks of yin qi being young and few, therefore it is called Rui;

sentences.zh: 痿陽不用事，故曰賓。

translations.literal: Withered yang not use affairs, therefore called Bin.
translations.idiomatic: Withered yang does not use affairs, therefore it is called Bin.

translations.literal: Qing Ming wind dwells southeast corner, governs wind blow ten thousand things west them. To Zhen. Zhen, speak ten thousand things increase big zhen zhen thus. West to Yi. Yi, speak ten thousand things all have feather wings. Fourth month, pitch middle Zhong Lu. Zhong Lu, speak ten thousand things all travel west go. Its at twelve branches for Si. Si, speak yang qi already exhausted. West to Seven Stars. Seven Stars, yang number complete at seven, thus called Seven Stars. West to Zhang. Zhang, speak ten thousand things all stretch. West to Zhu. Zhu, speak ten thousand things beginning decline, yang qi down zhu, thus called Zhu. Fifth month, pitch middle Rui Bin. Rui Bin, speak yin qi young few, thus rui; Wei yang not use affairs, thus bin.

sentences.zh: 景風居南方。

translations.literal: Jing wind dwells southern.
translations.idiomatic: The Jing wind dwells in the south.

sentences.zh: 景者，言陽氣道竟，故曰景風。

translations.literal: Jing ones, speak yang qi way exhaust, therefore called Jing wind.
translations.idiomatic: Jing speaks of the yang qi way being exhausted, therefore it is called Jing wind.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為午。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Wu.

sentences.zh: 午者，陰陽交，故曰午。

translations.literal: Wu ones, yin yang intersect, therefore called Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Wu is where yin and yang intersect, therefore it is called Wu.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為丙丁。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers is Bing Ding.
translations.idiomatic: Among the ten mothers it is Bing and Ding.

sentences.zh: 丙者，言陽道著明，故曰丙；

translations.literal: Bing ones, speak yang way manifest bright, therefore called Bing;
translations.idiomatic: Bing speaks of the yang way being manifest and bright, therefore it is called Bing;

sentences.zh: 丁者，言萬物之丁壯也，故曰丁。

translations.literal: Ding ones, speak ten thousand things of Ding Zhuang also, therefore called Ding.
translations.idiomatic: Ding speaks of the ten thousand things being Ding Zhuang, therefore it is called Ding.

sentences.zh: 西至于弧。

translations.literal: West until Hu.
translations.idiomatic: West until Hu.

sentences.zh: 弧者，言萬物之吳落且就死也。

translations.literal: Hu ones, speak ten thousand things of Wu fall moreover approach death also.
translations.idiomatic: Hu speaks of the ten thousand things Wu falling and moreover approaching death.

sentences.zh: 西至于狼。

translations.literal: West until Wolf.
translations.idiomatic: West until Wolf.

sentences.zh: 狼者，言萬物可度量，斷萬物，故曰狼。

translations.literal: Wolf ones, speak ten thousand things can measure quantity, cut ten thousand things, therefore called Wolf.
translations.idiomatic: Wolf speaks of the ten thousand things being measurable, cutting the ten thousand things, therefore it is called Wolf.

translations.literal: Jing wind dwells south. Jing, speak yang qi way end, thus Jing wind. Its at twelve branches for Wu. Wu, yin yang intersect, thus Wu. Its at ten mothers for Bing Ding. Bing, speak yang way manifest bright, thus Bing; Ding, speak ten thousand things ding strong, thus Ding. West to Hu. Hu, speak ten thousand things wu fall and approach death. West to Lang. Lang, speak ten thousand things can measure, cut ten thousand things, thus Lang.

sentences.zh: 涼風居西南維，主地。

translations.literal: Cool wind dwells southwest corner, governs earth.
translations.idiomatic: The Cool wind dwells in the southwest corner, governing earth.

sentences.zh: 地者，沈奪萬物氣也。

translations.literal: Earth ones, sink seize ten thousand things qi also.
translations.idiomatic: Earth sinks and seizes the ten thousand things' qi.

sentences.zh: 六月也，律中林鐘。

translations.literal: Sixth month also, pitchpipe middle Lin Zhong.
translations.idiomatic: This is the sixth month, the pitchpipe is Lin Zhong.

sentences.zh: 林鐘者，言萬物就死氣林林然。

translations.literal: Lin Zhong ones, speak ten thousand things approach death qi Lin Lin appearance.
translations.idiomatic: Lin Zhong speaks of the ten thousand things approaching death qi with a Lin Lin appearance.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為未。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Wei.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Wei.

sentences.zh: 未者，言萬物皆成，有滋味也。

translations.literal: Wei ones, speak ten thousand things all complete, have flavors also.
translations.idiomatic: Wei speaks of the ten thousand things all being complete, having flavors.

sentences.zh: 北至於罰。

translations.literal: North until Fa.
translations.idiomatic: North until Fa.

sentences.zh: 罰者，言萬物氣奪可伐也。

translations.literal: Fa ones, speak ten thousand things qi seize can attack also.
translations.idiomatic: Fa speaks of the ten thousand things' qi being seized and attackable.

sentences.zh: 北至於參。

translations.literal: North until Shen.
translations.idiomatic: North until Shen.

sentences.zh: 參言萬物可參也，故曰參。

translations.literal: Shen speak ten thousand things can compare also, therefore called Shen.
translations.idiomatic: Shen speaks of the ten thousand things being comparable, therefore it is called Shen.

sentences.zh: 七月也，律中夷則。

translations.literal: Seventh month also, pitchpipe middle Yi Ze.
translations.idiomatic: This is the seventh month, the pitchpipe is Yi Ze.

sentences.zh: 夷則，言陰氣之賊萬物也。

translations.literal: Yi Ze, speak yin qi of harm ten thousand things also.
translations.idiomatic: Yi Ze speaks of yin qi harming the ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為申。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Shen.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Shen.

sentences.zh: 申者，言陰用事，申賊萬物，故曰申。

translations.literal: Shen ones, speak yin use affairs, Shen harm ten thousand things, therefore called Shen.
translations.idiomatic: Shen speaks of yin using affairs, Shen harming the ten thousand things, therefore it is called Shen.

sentences.zh: 北至於濁。

translations.literal: North until Zhu.
translations.idiomatic: North until Zhu.

sentences.zh: 濁者，觸也，言萬物皆觸死也，故曰濁。

translations.literal: Zhu ones, touch also, speak ten thousand things all touch death also, therefore called Zhu.
translations.idiomatic: Zhu means touch, speaking of the ten thousand things all touching death, therefore it is called Zhu.

sentences.zh: 北至於留。

translations.literal: North until Liu.
translations.idiomatic: North until Liu.

sentences.zh: 留者，言陽氣之稽留也，故曰留。

translations.literal: Liu ones, speak yang qi of detain stay also, therefore called Liu.
translations.idiomatic: Liu speaks of yang qi being detained and staying, therefore it is called Liu.

sentences.zh: 八月也，律中南呂。

translations.literal: Eighth month also, pitchpipe middle Nan Lü.
translations.idiomatic: This is the eighth month, the pitchpipe is Nan Lü.

sentences.zh: 南呂者，言陽氣之旅入藏也。

translations.literal: Nan Lü ones, speak yang qi of group enter hide also.
translations.idiomatic: Nan Lü speaks of yang qi grouping and entering to hide.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為酉。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is You.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is You.

sentences.zh: 酉者，萬物之老也，故曰酉。

translations.literal: You ones, ten thousand things of old also, therefore called You.
translations.idiomatic: You is the old of the ten thousand things, therefore it is called You.

translations.literal: Liang wind dwells southwest corner, governs earth. Earth, sink seize ten thousand things qi. Sixth month, pitch middle Lin Zhong. Lin Zhong, speak ten thousand things approach death qi lin lin thus. Its at twelve branches for Wei. Wei, speak ten thousand things all complete, have flavors. North to Fa. Fa, speak ten thousand things qi seize can attack. North to Shen. Shen speak ten thousand things can shen, thus Shen. Seventh month, pitch middle Yi Ze. Yi Ze, speak yin qi harm ten thousand things. Its at twelve branches for Shen. Shen, speak yin use affairs, shen harm ten thousand things, thus Shen. North to Zhu. Zhu, touch, speak ten thousand things all touch death, thus Zhu. North to Liu. Liu, speak yang qi detain stay, thus Liu. Eighth month, pitch middle Nan Lu. Nan Lu, speak yang qi travel enter store. Its at twelve branches for You. You, ten thousand things old, thus You.

sentences.zh: 閶闔風居西方。

translations.literal: Chang He wind dwells western.
translations.idiomatic: The Chang He wind dwells in the west.

sentences.zh: 閶者，倡也；

translations.literal: Chang ones, lead also;
translations.idiomatic: Chang means to lead;

sentences.zh: 闔者，藏也。

translations.literal: He ones, hide also.
translations.idiomatic: He means to hide.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣道萬物，闔黃泉也。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi lead ten thousand things, he yellow springs also.
translations.idiomatic: It speaks of yang qi leading the ten thousand things, he to the yellow springs.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為庚辛。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers is Geng Xin.
translations.idiomatic: Among the ten mothers it is Geng and Xin.

sentences.zh: 庚者，言陰氣庚萬物，故曰庚；

translations.literal: Geng ones, speak yin qi Geng ten thousand things, therefore called Geng;
translations.idiomatic: Geng speaks of yin qi Geng-ing the ten thousand things, therefore it is called Geng;

sentences.zh: 辛者，言萬物之辛生，故曰辛。

translations.literal: Xin ones, speak ten thousand things of Xin live, therefore called Xin.
translations.idiomatic: Xin speaks of the ten thousand things' Xin living, therefore it is called Xin.

sentences.zh: 北至於胃。

translations.literal: North until Wei.
translations.idiomatic: North until Wei.

sentences.zh: 胃者，言陽氣就藏，皆胃胃也。

translations.literal: Wei ones, speak yang qi approach hide, all Wei Wei also.
translations.idiomatic: Wei speaks of yang qi approaching to hide, all Wei Wei.

sentences.zh: 北至於婁。

translations.literal: North until Lou.
translations.idiomatic: North until Lou.

sentences.zh: 婁者，呼萬物且內之也。

translations.literal: Lou ones, call ten thousand things moreover enter it also.
translations.idiomatic: Lou calls the ten thousand things and moreover enters them.

sentences.zh: 北至於奎。

translations.literal: North until Kui.
translations.idiomatic: North until Kui.

sentences.zh: 奎者，主毒螫殺萬物也，奎而藏之。

translations.literal: Kui ones, govern poison sting kill ten thousand things also, Kui and hide it.
translations.idiomatic: Kui governs poisoning and stinging to kill the ten thousand things, Kui and hide them.

sentences.zh: 九月也，律中無射。

translations.literal: Ninth month also, pitchpipe middle Wu She.
translations.idiomatic: This is the ninth month, the pitchpipe is Wu She.

sentences.zh: 無射者，陰氣盛用事，陽氣無餘也，故曰無射。

translations.literal: Wu She ones, yin qi flourish use affairs, yang qi no remainder also, therefore called Wu She.
translations.idiomatic: Wu She is yin qi flourishing and using affairs, yang qi having no remainder, therefore it is called Wu She.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為戌。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches is Xu.
translations.idiomatic: Among the twelve branches it is Xu.

sentences.zh: 戌者，言萬物盡滅，故曰戌。

translations.literal: Xu ones, speak ten thousand things exhaust extinguish, therefore called Xu.
translations.idiomatic: Xu speaks of the ten thousand things being exhausted and extinguished, therefore it is called Xu.

translations.literal: Chang He wind dwells west. Chang, lead; He, store. Speak yang qi exhaust ten thousand things, he yellow springs. Its at ten mothers for Geng Xin. Geng, speak yin qi geng ten thousand things, thus Geng; Xin, speak ten thousand things xin born, thus Xin. North to Wei. Wei, speak yang qi approach store, all wei wei. North to Lou. Lou, call ten thousand things and inner them. North to Kui. Kui, govern poison sting kill ten thousand things, Kui and store them. Ninth month, pitch middle Wu She. Wu She, yin qi flourish use affairs, yang qi no remainder, thus Wu She. Its at twelve branches for Xu. Xu, speak ten thousand things all extinguish, thus Xu.

sentences.zh: 律數：九九八十一以為宮。

translations.literal: Pitchpipe numbers: nine nine eighty one to make palace.
translations.idiomatic: Pitchpipe numbers: nine times nine is eighty-one, to make the palace note.

sentences.zh: 三分去一，五十四以為徵。

translations.literal: Three parts remove one, fifty four to make zheng.
translations.idiomatic: Three parts remove one, fifty-four to make the zheng note.

sentences.zh: 三分益一，七十二以為商。

translations.literal: Three parts add one, seventy two to make shang.
translations.idiomatic: Three parts add one, seventy-two to make the shang note.

sentences.zh: 三分去一，四十八以為羽。

translations.literal: Three parts remove one, forty eight to make yu.
translations.idiomatic: Three parts remove one, forty-eight to make the yu note.

sentences.zh: 三分益一，六十四以為角。

translations.literal: Three parts add one, sixty four to make jiao.
translations.idiomatic: Three parts add one, sixty-four to make the jiao note.

sentences.zh: 黃鐘長八寸七分一，宮。

translations.literal: Huangzhong length eight inch seven parts one, palace.
translations.idiomatic: Huangzhong length: eight inches, seven parts, one - palace note.

sentences.zh: 大呂長七寸五分三分（一）［二］。

translations.literal: Dali length seven inch five parts three parts two.
translations.idiomatic: Dali length: seven inches, five parts, three parts, two.

sentences.zh: 太蔟長七寸（七）［十］分二，角。

translations.literal: Tai Cu length seven inch ten parts two, horn.
translations.idiomatic: Tai Cu length: seven inches, ten parts, two - horn note.

sentences.zh: 夾鐘長六寸（一）［七］分三分一。

translations.literal: Jia Zhong length six inch seven parts three parts one.
translations.idiomatic: Jia Zhong length: six inches, seven parts, three parts, one.

sentences.zh: 姑洗長六寸（七）［十］分四，羽。

translations.literal: Gu Xi length six inch ten parts four, feather.
translations.idiomatic: Gu Xi length: six inches, ten parts, four - feather note.

sentences.zh: 仲呂長五寸九分三分二，徵。

translations.literal: Zhong Lü length five inch nine parts three parts two, zheng.
translations.idiomatic: Zhong Lü length: five inches, nine parts, three parts, two - zheng note.

sentences.zh: 蕤賓長五寸六分三分（一）［二］。

translations.literal: Rui Bin length five inch six parts three parts two.
translations.idiomatic: Rui Bin length: five inches, six parts, three parts, two.

sentences.zh: 林鐘長五寸（七）［十］分四，角。

translations.literal: Lin Zhong length five inch ten parts four, horn.
translations.idiomatic: Lin Zhong length: five inches, ten parts, four - horn note.

sentences.zh: 夷則長五寸［四分］三分二，商。

translations.literal: Yi Ze length five inch four parts three parts two, shang.
translations.idiomatic: Yi Ze length: five inches, four parts, three parts, two - shang note.

sentences.zh: 南呂長四寸（七）［十］分八，徵。

translations.literal: Nan Lü length four inch ten parts eight, zheng.
translations.idiomatic: Nan Lü length: four inches, ten parts, eight - zheng note.

sentences.zh: 無射長四寸四分三分二。

translations.literal: Wu She length four inch four parts three parts two.
translations.idiomatic: Wu She length: four inches, four parts, three parts, two.

sentences.zh: 應鐘長四寸二分三分二，羽。

translations.literal: Ying Zhong length four inch two parts three parts two, feather.
translations.idiomatic: Ying Zhong length: four inches, two parts, three parts, two - feather note.

translations.literal: Pitch numbers: nine nine eighty one as gong. Divide three remove one, fifty four as zhi. Divide three add one, seventy two as shang. Divide three remove one, forty eight as yu. Divide three add one, sixty four as jue. Huang Zhong length eight cun seven fen one, gong. Da Lu length seven cun five fen three two. Tai Cu length seven cun ten fen two, jue. Jia Zhong length six cun seven fen three one. Gu Xi length six cun ten fen four, yu. Zhong Lu length five cun nine fen three two, zhi. Rui Bin length five cun six fen three two. Lin Zhong length five cun ten fen four, jue. Yi Ze length five cun four fen three two, shang. Nan Lu length four cun ten fen eight, zhi. Wu She length four cun four fen three two. Ying Zhong length four cun two fen three two, yu.

sentences.zh: 生鐘分：子一分。

translations.literal: Live bell parts: zi one part.
translations.idiomatic: Live bell parts: zi - one part.

sentences.zh: 丑三分二。

translations.literal: Chou three parts two.
translations.idiomatic: Chou - three parts, two.

sentences.zh: 寅九分八。

translations.literal: Yin nine parts eight.
translations.idiomatic: Yin - nine parts, eight.

sentences.zh: 卯二十七分十六。

translations.literal: Mao twenty seven parts sixteen.
translations.idiomatic: Mao - twenty-seven parts, sixteen.

sentences.zh: 辰八十一分六十四。

translations.literal: Chen eighty one parts sixty four.
translations.idiomatic: Chen - eighty-one parts, sixty-four.

sentences.zh: 巳二百四十三分一百二十八。

translations.literal: Si two hundred forty three parts one hundred twenty eight.
translations.idiomatic: Si - two hundred forty-three parts, one hundred twenty-eight.

sentences.zh: 午七百二十九分五百一十二。

translations.literal: Wu seven hundred twenty nine parts five hundred twelve.
translations.idiomatic: Wu - seven hundred twenty-nine parts, five hundred twelve.

sentences.zh: 未二千一百八十七分一千二十四。

translations.literal: Wei two thousand one hundred eighty seven parts one thousand twenty four.
translations.idiomatic: Wei - two thousand one hundred eighty-seven parts, one thousand twenty-four.

sentences.zh: 申六千五百六十一分四千九十六。

translations.literal: Shen six thousand five hundred sixty one parts four thousand ninety six.
translations.idiomatic: Shen - six thousand five hundred sixty-one parts, four thousand ninety-six.

sentences.zh: 酉一萬九千六百八十三分八千一百九十二。

translations.literal: You ten thousand nine thousand six hundred eighty three parts eight thousand one hundred ninety two.
translations.idiomatic: You - nineteen thousand six hundred eighty-three parts, eight thousand one hundred ninety-two.

sentences.zh: 戌五萬九千四十九分三萬二千七百六十八。

translations.literal: Xu fifty nine thousand forty nine parts thirty two thousand seven hundred sixty eight.
translations.idiomatic: Xu - fifty-nine thousand forty-nine parts, thirty-two thousand seven hundred sixty-eight.

sentences.zh: 亥十七萬七千一百四十七分六萬五千五百三十六。

translations.literal: Hai one hundred seventy seven thousand one hundred forty seven parts sixty five thousand five hundred thirty six.
translations.idiomatic: Hai - one hundred seventy-seven thousand one hundred forty-seven parts, sixty-five thousand five hundred thirty-six.

translations.literal: Born bell divisions: Zi one fen. Chou three fen two. Yin nine fen eight. Mao twenty seven fen sixteen. Chen eighty one fen sixty four. Si two hundred forty three fen one hundred twenty eight. One yue four hundred eight zhu, two sixteen zhu, three one hundred twenty zhu, four five hundred seventy six zhu, five three thousand four hundred fifty six zhu, six twenty five thousand seven hundred seventy six zhu. Da Lu: length seven cun five fen three two, diameter two fen nine li seven hao, circumference nine fen, weight one hundred eighty four zhu. Tai Cu: length seven cun ten fen two, diameter two fen eight li six hao, circumference eight fen eight li, weight one hundred sixty eight zhu. Jia Zhong: length six cun seven fen three one, diameter two fen seven li four hao, circumference eight fen six li, weight one hundred fifty two zhu. Gu Xi: length six cun ten fen four, diameter two fen six li two hao, circumference eight fen four li, weight one hundred thirty six zhu. Zhong Lu: length five cun nine fen three two, diameter two fen five li, circumference eight fen two li, weight one hundred twenty zhu.

sentences.zh: 生黃鐘術曰：以下生者，倍其實，三其法。

translations.literal: Live Huangzhong method says: below living ones, double their real, three their method.
translations.idiomatic: The method for living Huangzhong says: for those living below, double their real number, triple their method.

sentences.zh: 以上生者，四其實，三其法。

translations.literal: Above living ones, four their real, three their method.
translations.idiomatic: For those living above, quadruple their real number, triple their method.

sentences.zh: 上九，商八，羽七，角六，宮五，徵九。

translations.literal: Shang nine, shang eight, yu seven, jiao six, gong five, zheng nine.
translations.idiomatic: Shang: nine, shang: eight, yu: seven, jiao: six, gong: five, zheng: nine.

sentences.zh: 置一而九三之以為法。

translations.literal: Place one and nine triple it to make method.
translations.idiomatic: Place one and triple nine to make the method.

sentences.zh: 實如法，得長一寸。

translations.literal: Real like method, obtain length one inch.
translations.idiomatic: The real number equals the method, obtaining a length of one inch.

sentences.zh: 凡得九寸，命曰「黃鐘之宮」。

translations.literal: All obtain nine inches, name called "Huangzhong of palace".
translations.idiomatic: Whenever obtaining nine inches, it is named 'Huangzhong's palace note'.

sentences.zh: 故曰音始於宮，窮於角；

translations.literal: Therefore called sound begins at palace, exhausts at horn;
translations.idiomatic: Therefore it is said: sound begins with the palace note, exhausts with the horn note;

sentences.zh: 數始於一，終於十，成於三；

translations.literal: Numbers begin at one, end at ten, complete at three;
translations.idiomatic: Numbers begin at one, end at ten, are completed at three;

sentences.zh: 氣始於冬至，周而復生。

translations.literal: Qi begins at winter solstice, cycles and again lives.
translations.idiomatic: Qi begins at winter solstice, cycles around and is reborn.

translations.literal: Rui Bin: length five cun six fen three two, diameter two fen four li, circumference eight fen, weight one hundred eight zhu. Lin Zhong: length five cun ten fen four, diameter two fen three li, circumference seven fen eight li, weight ninety six zhu. Yi Ze: length five cun four fen three two, diameter two fen two li, circumference seven fen six li, weight eighty four zhu. Place one nine three with as method. Solid like method, get length one cun. Ying Zhong: length four cun two fen three two, diameter one fen nine li, circumference seven fen, weight fifty four zhu. Bell large its sound large sparse, bell small its sound small dense. Each according its bell diameter inspect with stopped fen make it. Qi begins winter solstice, circle return born.

sentences.zh: 神生於無，形成於有，形然後數，形而成聲，故曰神使氣，氣就形。

translations.literal: Spirit lives from nothing, forms from having, form then numbers, form then becomes sound, therefore called spirit makes qi, qi approaches form.
translations.idiomatic: The spirit is born from nothingness, takes form from existence. Form then produces numbers, form then produces sound. Therefore it is said: the spirit commands the qi, the qi conforms to form.

sentences.zh: 形理如類有可類。

translations.literal: Form principle like categories have what can categorize.
translations.idiomatic: The principles of form are like categories - they have what can be categorized.

sentences.zh: 或未形而未類，或同形而同類，類而可班，類而可識。

translations.literal: Either not yet formed and not yet categorized, or same form and same category, categorize and can arrange, categorize and can recognize.
translations.idiomatic: Some are not yet formed and not yet categorized, some have the same form and same category. When categorized they can be arranged, when categorized they can be recognized.

sentences.zh: 聖人知天地識之別，故從有以至未有，以得細若氣，微若聲。

translations.literal: Sages know heaven earth recognize their distinction, therefore from having reach not having, to obtain fine like qi, subtle like sound.
translations.idiomatic: The sages know the distinction between heaven and earth's recognition, therefore they proceed from existence to non-existence, to obtain that which is fine like qi, subtle like sound.

sentences.zh: 然聖人因神而存之，雖妙必效情，核其華道者明矣。

translations.literal: Yet sages follow spirit and preserve it, though marvelous must imitate emotions, examine their flowery way ones clear already.
translations.idiomatic: Yet the sages follow the spirit and preserve it. Though marvelous, they must imitate the emotions. Those who examine their flowery way are already clear.

sentences.zh: 非有聖心以乘聰明，孰能存天地之神而成形之情哉？

translations.literal: Not having sage heart to ride intelligence wisdom, who can preserve heaven earth spirit and complete form emotions?
translations.idiomatic: If not having the sage's heart to ride intelligence and wisdom, who can preserve heaven and earth's spirit and complete the emotions of form?

sentences.zh: 神者，物受之而不能知（及）其去來，故聖人畏而欲存之。

translations.literal: Spirit ones, things receive it but cannot know their coming going, therefore sages fear and desire preserve it.
translations.idiomatic: The spirit - things receive it but cannot know its comings and goings, therefore the sages fear it and desire to preserve it.

sentences.zh: 唯欲存之，神之亦存。

translations.literal: Only desire preserve it, spirit it also preserves.
translations.idiomatic: Only desiring to preserve it, the spirit also preserves.

sentences.zh: 其欲存之者，故莫貴焉。

translations.literal: Their desire preserve it ones, therefore nothing precious there.
translations.idiomatic: Those who desire to preserve it - therefore nothing is more precious.

translations.literal: Upper nine with lower nine all empty number, empty number, accumulate solid number as denominator, with upper nine lower nine as method. Thus upper nine, bell already upper born, lower nine, bell already lower born. Bell already upper born clear double half, bell already lower born clear not half. Sage know heaven earth know distinction, thus from have reach not have, with get fine like qi, subtle like sound. Yet sage according spirit store it, though wonderful must effect feelings, examine its flower way clear. Pitches divide twelve, even qi divide twenty four. Spirit, things receive it cannot know its go come, thus sage fear desire store it. Twenty four pitches zhun, zhun, thus even tune qi. Jun, thus level.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：（故）［在］旋璣玉衡以齊七政，即天地二十八宿。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: In whirling jade balance to align seven governments, namely heaven earth twenty eight lodgings.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: In the whirling jade balance to align the seven governments, namely heaven and earth's twenty-eight lodgings.

sentences.zh: 十母，十二子，鐘律調自上古。

translations.literal: Ten mothers, twelve children, bell pitchpipes harmonize from high antiquity.
translations.idiomatic: The ten mothers, twelve children, the bells and pitchpipes have been harmonized since high antiquity.

sentences.zh: 建律運歷造日度，可據而度也。

translations.literal: Establish pitchpipes move calendar make sun degrees, can rely and measure also.
translations.idiomatic: Establishing the pitchpipes, moving the calendar, making the sun's degrees - these can be relied upon for measurement.

sentences.zh: 合符節，通道德，即從斯之謂也。

translations.literal: Combine tally sections, connect morality virtue, namely follow this of called also.
translations.idiomatic: Combining tally and sections, connecting morality and virtue - this is what is called following this.

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: In Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven govern, then heaven earth twenty eight lodges. Weigh thus level light heavy. Build pitch transport calendar make day degree, can according measure. Combine tally sections, connect morality way, then from this called.
